alert.note: Alert for Bosque; McLennan (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 28 at 7:51PM CDT until October 29 at 10:24AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... North Bosque River At Valley Mills affecting Bosque and McLennan Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...North Bosque River at Valley Mills. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 36.0 feet, Minor out of bank flow is expected. Caution should be exercised because the right approach ramp to the bridge will begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 37.2 feet. - Bankfull stage is 36.0 feet. - Flood stage is 36.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this evening and continue falling to 6.9 feet Thursday morning. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd.
